autoUpdate.label: Refresh server state automatically
autoUpdate.tooltip: When enabled the server is queried for updates at regular intervals.

updateRateInSec.label: Server refresh period
updateRateInSec.tooltip: Defines the automatic server refresh period.

adaptiveUpdate.label: Drift (increase) server refresh period when inactive
adaptiveUpdate.tooltip: When enabled the server refresh period is increased at every automatic refresh until the maximum period is reached. If the user in the meantime interact with the server the refresh period is set back to its original value and whole process starts again.

adaptiveUpdateMode.label: Server refresh drift increase method
adaptiveUpdateMode.tooltip: Defines how the drift is increased. In linear mode the increment is added to the current drift, while in drift x N mode the current drift value is always multiplied by the given N factor.
adaptiveUpdateMode.values_label: linear/drift x 1.2/drift x 1.4/drift x 1.6/drift x 1.8/drift x 2

adaptiveUpdateIncrementInSec.label: Server refresh drift increment
adaptiveUpdateIncrementInSec.tooltip: Defines the increment in seconds to increase the server refresh period at every automatic refresh. The actual way the increment is used depends on Server refresh drift increase method.

maxAdaptiveUpdateRateInMin.label: Do not increase server refresh period over
maxAdaptiveUpdateRateInMin.tooltip: Defines the maximum server refresh period. When it is reached the refresh period is not increased any more.

blinkUpdateButtonLimit.label: Do not blink refresh button for automatic refresh for periods less than
blinkUpdateButtonLimit.tooltip: In automatic refresh mode the refresh button will not blink on automatic refresh when the total refresh period is shorter than the specified value.

showLastRefreshTimeInAutoMode.label: Show time of last refresh in automatic refresh mode
showLastRefreshTimeInAutoMode.tooltip: If enabled shows the time of the last refresh in automatic refresh mode. If the automatic refresh is switched off the last refresh time is always visible.

readFilesFromDisk.label: Read files from disk when appropriate
readFilesFromDisk.tooltip:
The following steps are tried to fetch the files:
  1. fetch the files from the logserver (if defined)
  2. read from disk (if option is enabled and file is accessible)
  3. fetch from the ecflow server

maxOutputFileLines.label: Fetch the last
maxOutputFileLines.suffix: lines of files from the server

logServerHost.label: Custom logserver host
logServerHost.tooltip: Takes precedence over the ECF_LOGHOST ecflow variable

logServerPort.label: Custom logserver port
logServerPort.tooltip: Takes precedence over the ECF_LOGPORT ecflow variable.

uidForServerLogTransfer.label: Remote username to fetch server logs

maxSizeForTimelineData.label: Maximum data size to load from current server log

nodeMenuMode.label: Menu mode
nodeMenuMode.tooltip: Controls what commands are available in the node context menu.

defStatusMenuModeControl.label: Enable Defstatus submenu in these modes
defStatusMenuModeControl.tooltip: Controls when the Defstatus submenu is available
